channel.title: R on Matías Isla
channel.description: Recent content in R on Matías Isla

item.title: Community Ratings Visualization
item.description: It’s been two weeks since I started to learn to use R and it has been a huge challenge since I don’t really have a background in terms of programming. To learn I’ve done a few courses over edX and I’ve followed some youtube tutorials but I haven’t really done any project of my own… until now!
